items.sentence: Tom will have an answer for you by next week.
Tom drinks about three liters of water a day.
Tom drowned in Lake Superior three years ago.
Tom explained the reason he was late to Mary.
Don\'t forget to let me know when it\'s time.
Tom ran up the stairs towards Mary\'s office.
Tom says he can\'t wear a pink shirt to work.
I don\'t know why you didn\'t tell the truth.
I don\'t like the dress that you\'re wearing.
Tom closes his eyes when he swims underwater.
Tom complained that he had too much homework.
Tom could never make me laugh the way you do.
That boy over there told me his name was Tom.
Tom thought he had all the time in the world.
Are you absolutely sure this is Tom\'s house?
Tom and Mary never kiss each other in public.
Tom and Mary said they would be walking home.
Tom and Mary told John they were embarrassed.
Tom and Mary usually take it easy on Sundays.
Tom is just trying to be romantic, isn\'t he?
